name: Francis Victa
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Hands-on developer with 5+ years of experience in backend systems, REST APIs, and SQL databases, plus 7+ years in data management and analysis. Passionate about building scalable solutions that solve real problems. Fast learner, highly adaptable, and knowledgeable in software development best practices, object-oriented design, and Agile methodologies.
traits: Willing to learn and apply new technologies quickly
Advanced problem solving and troubleshooting skills
Strong understanding of software development best practices
Experience with Agile methodologies and collaborative workflows
Able to break down complex problems into manageable solutions
Experience with AI-driven workflows and AI systems integration

responsibilities: Updated internal front-end UI using React and Next.js
Managed MSSQL and MySQL databases
Developed AWS Lambda functions for IP logging microservices
Implemented Redis caching to optimize data fetching
Delivered end-to-end features based on stakeholder requirements
Integrated AI-driven content tools using the OpenAI API
achievements: Enhanced user IP tracking and marketing insights via the IP logging service
Reduced database load and improved data fetch performance with Redis caching
Boosted content engagement by integrating AI-generated click-bait titles
Maintained a 100% on-time delivery rate for stakeholder-requested features

responsibilities: Developed serverless microservices using Google Cloud Functions for email and data ingestion
Managed application deployment on Google Cloud Platform
Designed and implemented ETL pipelines to process YouTube data into PostgreSQL
achievements: Streamlined data ingestion workflows, reducing manual processing time
Improved system scalability by leveraging GCP serverless architecture
Automated YouTube data ETL processes for in-house analysis

responsibilities: Deployed backend REST services on AWS EC2 and hosted frontend on AWS Amplify
Established development, staging, and production environments
Implemented Google OAuth for secure user authentication
Incorporated warehouse inventory management best practices into app design
achievements: Improved operational efficiency by enabling tracking and management of hundreds of products
Enhanced user satisfaction through iterative feature improvements based on feedback
Ensured reliable deployments and environment consistency across all environments

responsibilities: Managed MS Access database projects and internal dashboards
Automated data visualizations in Access and Tableau
Authored SQL scripts for data extraction and transformation
Applied statistical methods such as regression analysis for data interpretation
achievements: Reduced manual reporting effort by 75% through automation
Delivered data insights that informed key academic decisions

responsibilities: Provided Tier-1 technical support, handling inbound calls and issue triage
Collaborated on reporting template enhancements to improve workflows
Maintained and refined Excel-based reporting tools based on feedback
achievements: Reduced average issue resolution time by streamlining escalation processes
Increased team productivity by redesigning reporting templates
Automated recurring data entry tasks, saving hours of manual work

responsibilities: Operated production line machinery and maintained quality standards
Volunteered for process improvement initiatives during overtime
achievements: Implemented workflow improvements that increased production efficiency by 10%
Recognized by management for proactive contributions to process enhancements

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Management Engineering (Honours)

projects.title: JobHunter AI Assistant
projects.description: Built a Streamlit-based job-hunting app integrating OpenAI GPT-4 API to organize applications, extract job data, generate tailored documents, and track applications in Google Sheets.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
